name: Mech Fish
description:
You're a fish who was kidnapped by a crazy scientist.

His goal was to enable fish to move a mechanical suit.

Why? No one knows.

Many fish were lost in the process.

You've menaged to  be his first success and are able to control the suit. 

Now your only goal is to leave his underground lab and return to your pond.

Escape this madness by activating the goals through pushing buttons and opening doors.

Navigate your way to freedom.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Right:                Right Arrow / D

Left:                    Left Arrow / A

Look up:           Up Arrow / W

Look Down:    Down Arrow / S

Jump:                   Space

Pause:                 P / Esc

Controller:

Right / Left / Look up / Look down:       Left Stick / D-Pad

Look up / down : Left and Right Stick

Jump:                                                                      South Button [A (XBOX)  X (Playstation)]

Pause:                                                                     Start Button

Music by Constantin Dorsch + Jasmina Graf
